Statute.Title: Canada — European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement Implementation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Accord économique et commercial global entre le Canada et l’Union européenne, Loi de mise en œuvre de l’)

General.Text: General, 2017, c. 6, s. 14 (Orders re Article 29.14 of Agreement)

Item.Text: — ss. 8(3), 11(1)(a) and (2) and 13(a) come into force on a day to be fixed by order of the Governor in Council, but that day must not be before the day referred to in s. 138(1) see s. 138(2) — Not in force

CIF.Text: CIF, 2018, c. 27, ss. 209 and 212 in force on assent 13.12.2018
